title: The Todd Starnes Show – September 19th, 2019
text:
Here's what happened today on The Todd Starnes Show:

Todd speaks with Rep. Doug Collins (R-GA) about whether Democrats will continue to push for the impeachment of President Trump.



Email Embed

+ Embed Code



Embed the following code on your website:



Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd speaks with Pastor Rhyan Glezman about Pete Buttigieg's response to the discovery of fetal remains found on the property of an Indiana abortion doctor.

Embed the following code on your website:



Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd speaks with former California Assemblyman Travis Allen discusses why President Trump is taking an extra interest in fixing the problems of California.

Todd speaks with First Liberty Institute's Jeremy Dys about a football team in Georgia being allowed to pray before games.
description:
Here's what happened today on The Todd Starnes Show:

Todd speaks with Rep. Doug Collins (R-GA) about whether Democrats will continue to push for the impeachment of President Trump.



Todd speaks with Pastor Rhyan Glezman about Pete Buttigieg's response to the discovery of fetal remains found
